tweet.text: For this year’s #FrederickDouglass bicentennial, see our newly-digital #FRUS offerings including correspondence by and to Frederick Douglass as U.S. Minister Resident to #Haiti and Chargé d’Affaires to #DominicanRepublic: https://t.co/cIOPZ7zQk2 @FredDouglassNPS https://t.co/48f4F3xnBB
tweet.html: For this year’s #FrederickDouglass bicentennial, see our newly-digital #FRUS offerings including correspondence by and to Frederick Douglass as U.S. Minister Resident to #Haiti and Chargé d’Affaires to #DominicanRepublic: go.usa.gov/xQaMH @FredDouglassNPS pic.twitter.com/48f4F3xnBB
